name: Alappaa shoulderpads

items.alias: Superior Icy Shoulderpads of Explosive Power
Superior Icy Shoulderpads of the Powerful Mind

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** You'll get parts for upgrade in Alappaa and in Dustbrigade Outpost. There are 3 different types you can upgrade them into. But first you need to unfreeze them. *** #L "Frozen Shoulderpads" "269896" #L "Permafrost Melting Tool" "269805" #L "Permafrost Armor Component" "269937" #L "Combat Program" "269946" or #L "Nano Technology Program" "269945" or #L "Melee Program" "269947" -And the upgrades- #L "Master Combat Program" "269960" or #L "Master Nano Technology Program" "269959" or #L "Master Melee Program" "269961" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Unfreezing the shoulderpads Frozen Shoulderpads + Permafrost Melting Tool = #L "Shoulderpads of the Icy Wastes" "269897" Skills: | None | Superior Icy Shoulderpads of Explosive Power Combat Program + Permafrost Armor Component = #L "Combat Attuned Permafrost Armor Component" "269938" Skills: | 1500 ME | Shoulderpads of the Icy Wastes + Combat Attuned Permafrost Armor Component = #L "Icy Shoulderpads of Explosive Power" "269898" Skills: | none | Icy Shoulderpads of Explosive Power + Master Combat Program = #L "Superior Icy Shoulderpads of Explosive Power" "269899" Skills: | none | Superior Icy Shoulderpads of the Powerful Mind Nano Technology Program + Permafrost Armor Component = #L "Nano Attuned Permafrost Armor Component" "269939" Skills: | 1500 ME | Shoulderpads of the Icy Wastes + Nano Attuned Permafrost Armor Component = #L "Icy Shoulderpads of Explosive Power" "269898" Skills: | none | Icy Shoulderpads of the Powerful Mind + Master Nano Technology Program = #L "Superior Icy Shoulderpads of the Powerful Mind" "269900" Skills: | none | Superior Icy Shoulderpads of Brawn Melee Program + Permafrost Armor Component = #L "Melee Attuned Permafrost Armor Component" "269940" Skills: | 1500 ME | Shoulderpads of the Icy Wastes + Melee Attuned Permafrost Armor Component = #L "Icy Shoulderpads of Brawn" "269902" Skills: | none | Icy Shoulderpads of Brawn + Master Melee Program = #L "Superior Icy Shoulderpads of Brawn" "269903" Skills: | none |
